parameters.label: Can Dance
parameters.infoText: Whether or not the character can dance at all.

parameters.label: Dance Suffix
parameters.infoText: The suffix to use for the character's dance animations, for example "-alt" to make the character play "idle-alt" instead of "idle".

parameters.label: Trigger at Start
parameters.infoText: If checked, this event will trigger when the song first loads in instead of triggering where it's placed in the song.
